Title: Description
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Creators can receive ratings and reviews from other users based on their collaborations and performances.

Title: Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Creators can receive ratings and reviews from other users based on their collaborations and performances.

Title: Title
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Description

Title: Showcase Talent
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As a music collaborator, I want to effectively showcase my musical talent on the platform so that I can attract the attention of record labels and brands.
Unnamed: 2: Allows the user to highlight their skills and creativity, increasing their chances of being discovered by industry professionals.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should provide a user-friendly interface for uploading and sharing music tracks, videos, and other media.The platform should allow users to create a comprehensive profile with information about their musical background, influences, and achievements.The platform should have a rating and review system for users to provide feedback on each other's work.

Title: Discover New Music
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As a music collaborator, I want to discover new music and talent on the platform so that I can be inspired and potentially collaborate with other artists.
Unnamed: 2: Allows the user to explore and appreciate different genres, styles, and emerging artists, fostering creativity and potential collaborations.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should have a recommendation system that suggests new music and artists based on the user's preferences and listening history.The platform should provide curated playlists, charts, or featured sections to highlight new and popular music.The platform should allow users to follow and connect with artists whose work they admire.

Title: Find Suitable Creators
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As a content production manager, I want to easily find creators with the right skills and experience for content production projects.
Unnamed: 2: Saves time and effort in searching for suitable creators.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should have a search and filter functionality to narrow down creators based on skills, experience, and location.Creators' profiles should include detailed information about their skills, experience, and past projects.The platform should provide recommendations of creators based on project requirements.

Title: Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As a content production manager, I want to view ratings and reviews of creators from other users.
Unnamed: 2: Helps in evaluating creators' reputation and quality of work.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should display ratings and reviews for each creator, based on feedback from other users.The platform should allow users to leave ratings and reviews for creators after collaborations.The platform should provide a rating system with clear criteria and guidelines.

Title: Title
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Description

Creator Ratings and Reviews: Users can upload and share music tracks, videos, and other media on the platform.
Unnamed: 6: Supported media formats and file size limits.

Title: Input Requirements: Create Comprehensive Profile
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Users can create a comprehensive profile with information about their musical background, influences, and achievements.
Unnamed: 6: Required and optional fields for profile information.

Title: Processing Requirements: Rating and Review System
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should have a rating and review system for users to provide feedback on each other's work.
Unnamed: 6: Clear criteria and guidelines for rating and reviewing.

Title: Output Requirements: Display Recommendations
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should have a recommendation system that suggests new music and artists based on the user's preferences and listening history.
Unnamed: 4: List of recommended music and artists.
Unnamed: 6: User preferences and listening history data.

Title: Output Requirements: Curated Playlists and Featured Sections
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should provide curated playlists, charts, or featured sections to highlight new and popular music.
Unnamed: 4: Curated playlists, charts, or featured sections.
Unnamed: 6: Selection criteria for curated playlists and featured sections.

Title: Output Requirements: Connect with Artists
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should allow users to follow and connect with artists whose work they admire.

Title: Input Requirements: Search and Filter Functionality
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should have a search and filter functionality to narrow down creators based on skills, experience, and location.
Unnamed: 5: User sets search and filter criteria.

Title: Input Requirements: Creator Profile Information
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Creators' profiles should include detailed information about their skills, experience, and past projects.
Unnamed: 6: Required and optional fields for creator profile information.

Title: Output Requirements: Recommendations of Creators
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should provide recommendations of creators based on project requirements.

Title: Output Requirements: Display Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should display ratings and reviews for each creator, based on feedback from other users.
Unnamed: 4: Ratings and reviews for each creator.

Title: Input Requirements: Leave Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should allow users to leave ratings and reviews for creators after collaborations.
Unnamed: 6: Rating and review guidelines and restrictions.

Title: Business Rules: Clear Rating System Criteria
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should provide a rating system with clear criteria and guidelines.

Title: Title
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Description

Title: Fast Loading of Creator Profiles
Creator Ratings and Reviews: When viewing creator profiles, the system should load the necessary information and media elements (e.g., images, videos) within 3 seconds to provide a smooth user experience.

Title: Efficient Search for Creators
Creator Ratings and Reviews: When searching for creators based on criteria (e.g., genre, location), the system should return results within 2 seconds, even during peak usage times.

Title: Real-time Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: When users submit ratings and reviews for creators, the system should update the overall ratings and display the latest reviews in real-time (within 1 second) to provide accurate and up-to-date information.

Title: Optimized Collaboration Performance
Creator Ratings and Reviews: During content collaboration between creators, the system should ensure smooth performance and responsiveness, with minimal latency or delays, to facilitate efficient and seamless collaboration.

Title: Scalability for High User Traffic
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The system should be able to handle a high volume of user traffic, especially during peak times, without significant degradation in performance or response time.

Title: Scalable User Profile Storage
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As the number of creators and users grows, the system should be able to scale the storage and retrieval of user profiles efficiently, ensuring quick access to creator information and collaboration history.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Collaboration Matching
Creator Ratings and Reviews: To handle the increasing number of collaborations and improve matching accuracy, the system should be horizontally scalable, allowing for parallel processing and efficient matching of creators based on their skills, interests, and availability.

Title: Efficient Content Distribution for Media Assets
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As the platform grows, the system should ensure efficient distribution of media assets, such as music tracks, videos, and promotional materials, to creators, record labels, and brands. This includes scalable media streaming and content delivery networks (CDNs) integration.

Title: Scalable Search and Filtering for Creator Discovery
Creator Ratings and Reviews: To accommodate a large number of creators and provide a seamless user experience, the system should be able to scale search and filtering functionalities, allowing users to easily discover and explore creators based on various criteria, such as genre, location, and popularity.

Title: Vertical Scalability for Sponsorship Deal Management
Creator Ratings and Reviews: As the number of sponsorship deals and brands increases, the system should be vertically scalable, allowing for efficient management of sponsorship deals, contract negotiations, and payment processing, ensuring smooth collaboration between creators, record labels, and brands.

Title: Compliance with Intellectual Property Rights
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should ensure that all content shared and used by creators, record labels, and brands comply with intellectual property rights, including copyright and trademark laws.

Title: Data Privacy and Consent
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should comply with data privacy regulations, ensuring that user data is collected, stored, and processed with proper consent and in accordance with applicable laws.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should provide transparency in sponsorship deals, including clear disclosure of the terms, conditions, and compensation involved in the collaboration between creators, record labels, and brands.

Title: Age Verification for User Accounts
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should implement age verification mechanisms to ensure that users accessing and using the platform are of legal age, especially when dealing with content that may have age restrictions.

Title: Compliance with Advertising Regulations
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should comply with advertising regulations, including proper disclosure of sponsored content and adherence to guidelines related to endorsements and promotions.

Title: User-friendly Collaboration Interface
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should provide a user-friendly interface for musicians and influencers to collaborate on content production, with intuitive controls and clear instructions.

Title: Efficient Profile Navigation
Creator Ratings and Reviews: Users should be able to easily navigate and view creators' profiles, with a clear layout and organized sections for relevant information such as past collaborations, performance history, and social media presence.

Title: Simplified Sponsorship Deal Sign-up
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should streamline the process for record labels and brands to find creators and sign them for sponsorship deals, with clear instructions and a straightforward workflow.

Title: Transparent Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The system should display creators' ratings and reviews from other users, providing transparency and helping record labels and brands make informed decisions when selecting creators for collaborations or sponsorship deals.

Title: Accessible Rating and Review System
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should provide an accessible rating and review system, allowing users to easily rate and review creators based on their collaborations and performances, with clear guidelines and options for providing constructive feedback.

Title: Integration with Social Media APIs
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should integrate with social media APIs (such as Instagram, YouTube) to allow creators to showcase their content and reach a wider audience.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should integrate with authentication and authorization services to ensure secure access to creator profiles and prevent unauthorized access.

Title: Real-time Collaboration Notifications
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should integrate with real-time notification services to provide creators with instant notifications about collaboration requests, updates, and feedback.

Title: Integration with Payment Gateways
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should integrate with payment gateways to facilitate secure and seamless transactions for sponsorship deals and payments to creators.

Title: Integration with Content Management Systems
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should integrate with content management systems to enable creators to easily upload, manage, and showcase their content to potential sponsors and record labels.

Title: Integration with Analytics Platforms
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should integrate with analytics platforms to provide creators, record labels, and brands with insights and data about the performance and reach of their collaborations.

Title: Secure User Authentication
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should implement secure user authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication, to prevent unauthorized access to user accounts and protect sensitive information.

Title: Data Encryption
Creator Ratings and Reviews: All user data, including profiles, collaboration details, and sponsorship deals, should be encrypted both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access and data breaches.

Title: Access Controls
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should enforce role-based access controls to ensure that only authorized users have access to specific features and data. This includes restricting access to sensitive functionalities like user ratings and reviews.

Title: Secure Communication Channels
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should use secure communication protocols, such as HTTPS, for all data transmission between users, creators, record labels, and brands. This ensures the confidentiality and integrity of the information exchanged.

Title: Protection against Malicious Content
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should implement measures to detect and prevent the upload and dissemination of malicious content, such as malware or phishing links. This includes regular security scans and content moderation.

Title: High Availability for Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should ensure high availability for the Creator Ratings and Reviews feature, with a target uptime of 99.99%, to allow users to consistently provide and access ratings and reviews.

Title: Data Integrity for Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should maintain data integrity for the Creator Ratings and Reviews feature, ensuring that all ratings and reviews are accurately recorded and associated with the correct creators.

Title: Scalability for Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should be able to handle increasing user activity and growth in the number of creators, ensuring that the Creator Ratings and Reviews feature remains responsive and performs well even under high load.

Title: Backup and Recovery for Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should perform regular backups of the Creator Ratings and Reviews data and have a robust recovery process in place to minimize data loss and ensure quick restoration in the event of any system failures or disasters.

Title: Security for Creator Ratings and Reviews
Creator Ratings and Reviews: The platform should implement appropriate security measures to protect the integrity and confidentiality of the Creator Ratings and Reviews data, preventing unauthorized access, tampering, or manipulation of ratings and reviews.
